DESIGNER

I’m a designer based in the sunny island of Malta, currently looking for a masters program in interaction design. Experience design is my cup of tea but I'm comfortable dabbling around in code. As you might notice I'm busy writing case studies for the projects below, but would love to hear from you if you want to build something awesome together. You can get in touch via this email.
